title: The Motorcycle Club: Episode108
description:
The secretive world of Motorcycle Clubs are hard for outsiders to understand.  In this episode, I look at the events surrounding two Motorcycle Club related murders in Battersea, London, in 1998.

Sponsored by:  awaytravel.com/CRIME - claim £15 off your purchase using the Promo: CRIME

Sponsored by:  'Hangman' the excellent thriller from Daniel Cole, author of Sunday Times bestseller 'Ragdill'
